body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Speedy Cars Inc. My name is Bruce Martinez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Sara Lopez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is two four eight eight five six one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is sara dot lopez at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Sara. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the delay in the shipping of my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Sara. We will investigate this matter and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us, Sara. Your concerns are important to us. Have a wonderful day.
